data.title: Emilia Fox confirms she split from fiancé Luc Chaudhary five months ago
data.meta_description: Emilia Fox confirms she split from fiancé Luc Chaudhary five months ago after 18 months together.
data.text:
Emilia Fox has confirmed her split from fiancé Luc Chaudhary – revealing that the pair separated five months ago.

The actress, 46, who is best known for playing Dr Nikki Alexander in BBC series Silent Witness, set the record straight on speculation surrounding the break up by sharing a statement to Instagram.

She confirmed that herself and Luc are no longer together and chose to call it quits both ‘amicably and respectfully’.

Hitting back at reports claiming she had kicked Luc out of her London home, Emilia stressed that he had lived independently from her throughout her relationship and such speculation is untrue.

Her statement read: ‘The newspaper articles that have appeared regarding the break up of the relationship between Luc Chaudhary and myself are both hurtful and untrue.

‘I did not kick Luc out of my home. Luc and his wonderful sons lived independently in their own home throughout our relationship. Both our families had love and respect for us and our relationship.’

It continued: ‘5 months ago Luc and I decided to part ways. It was done amicably, respectfully and with great consideration to our children.

‘We still both care immensely about each other’s kids and about each other which is why these articles would be damaging for them to read or be told about.’

Emilia said: ‘We remained quiet about our break up, because it was and is a private matter to us.’

Her statement came after sources had claimed to The Sun that Emilia had asked Luc to leave her home in London and alleged her family ‘weren’t keen’ on her ex.

The TV star and Luc got engaged late last year and had plans to tie the knot next summer in 2021. News of their split comes after the pair had spent 18 months together.

While Luc is father to two sons, Emilia is mum to daughter Rose, nine, who she shares with ex Jeremy Gilley.

Earlier this year, Emilia had opened up on her romance and revealed it was ‘fun’ to be dating again.

She told Good Housekeeping: ‘It’s fun dating again and finding someone who you really enjoy being with. I love romance. I’m a great believer in second, third… even fourth chances at love.’

Emilia was previously married to actor Jared Harris in 2005. They split three years later in 2008, with their divorce being finalised the following year.

Metro.co.uk has reached out to Emilia’s rep for comment.
